title: Nvidia GeForce Now app adds native support for Apple M1 Macs just in time for Lost Ark arrival
content:
After adding support for the M1 through Rosetta last year, Nvidia has just announced that its GeForce Now cloud gaming service is picking up native support for M1 Macs through its latest app update.

moreâ€¦

The post Nvidia GeForce Now app adds native support for Apple M1 Macs just in time for Lost Ark arrival appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Rolling out as a part of the latest app update, Nvidia GeForce Now supports the Apple M1 chip natively instead of using Rosetta.
